attributes.action: Ensure that members of Parliament and government departments respond to members of the publics concerns in letters and other correspondence, rather than sending generic letters on issues raised
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As taxpayers, we are entitled to receive a proper and personal response to letters that are sent to MPs and Government departments. 

Many people are left increasingly frustrated at the generic letters they receive when raising important issues.

rejection.details: The request regarding MPs should be taken up with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
